title: The Other Side
description: Twins Finn and Eric’s peaceful lives are turned upside down when they are suddenly chased from their home and find themselves in another world they had no idea existed. There, they become embroiled in a fight for survival, hunted down by Venera, evil Queen of the Fairy race, and the war hungry King Drer, leader of the Elven people. Both desire something from the twins, the true meaning of which Finn and Eric are not even aware. As they start to encounter friends and foes along the way, the truth about their lives and the power that lies within their possession, begins to emerge. However, after becoming separated in this strange and hostile world, the chances of them surviving long enough to find one another and escape back to earth, get slimmer by the hour. The Other Side is the first novel in this thrilling dark fantasy trilogy. If you like fast-paced stories with twists and turns that will leave you on the edge of your seat, then you’ll love this series from the exciting new author Alan Hotchkiss.
author: Alan Hotchkiss
